thread.title: The Driven Podcast: Kia takes on the Chinese EV giants
thread.title_full: The Driven Podcast: Kia takes on the Chinese EV giants

author: Giles Parkinson
title: The Driven Podcast: Kia takes on the Chinese EV giants
text:
As Kia launches its new EV3, head of product Roland Rivero discussed the companies grand plan. Plus: The Driven team discuss the latest EV news.
You can find previous episodes of The Driven here, or on your favourite podcast platform.
